section.title: What is automatic installation?
section.para: As an addition to the interactive installation described in , &dinstaller; supports an unattended automatic installation.

section.title: How does automatic installation work?
section.para: &dinstaller; supports the following types of unattended installation:

listitem.para: This type of installation uses a customized file called profile that includes a description of the system to install.
This type of installation uses a plain shell script that enables custom pre-installation workflows.
